wiki.summary: In “​all of me,” backed by a soulful Rose Royce sample, 21 Savage puts forth his signature laid-back flow, addressing events that shaped him as a person. Savage delves into his childhood, marked by crime and tragedy. At the age of 7, he emigrated from England into the harsh streets of Atlanta, Georgia. His debut film, american dream: the 21 savage story explicitly details these points, expanding on this track’s narrative. Read more on Last.fm.
